name: 2D-Platform
description:
Created by Yue Shi

3 Modifications

1. Unique levels, Level 1 with a lot of , movement training

2. Unique levels, level 2 you will face a lot of enemies, and new challenges

3. In level 3, I add new ability to player which you can control gravity of your self.

4. I also create the script for gravity control based on my research on  Script API and part of my knowledge.
